critical_issues: [CRITICAL] No professional summary section. This is the first thing recruiters see.
[CRITICAL] No experience section detected. Add your work history.
warnings: [WARN] No LinkedIn URL found. Adding it increases recruiter engagement.
[WARN] No education section detected. Consider adding if applicable.
[WARN] No skills section found. Add a dedicated skills section for better ATS matching.
[WARN] Too many bullet points. Focus on 10-15 strongest achievements.
[WARN] Limited quantified achievements. Add numbers/percentages to demonstrate impact.
suggestions: [TIP] Add more industry keywords. Missing: accounting, financial analysis, budgeting, forecasting, gaap
[TIP] Improve bullet quality: Start with action verbs, include metrics, keep 50-150 chars.
[TIP] More bullets should start with action verbs. Revise passive statements.
[TIP] Consider adding more sections: Skills, Certifications, Projects, or Awards.
[TIP] For Swedish CVs: Consider adding a personal letter (personligt brev) as a complement.
